user_input: 슬라이드 6번에서 영어 문구들을 Camel case로 바꿔줘

plan.understanding: Convert English phrases on slide 6 to Camel Case.

tasks.description: Identify all English phrases on the slide.
tasks.target: All text boxes containing English phrases
tasks.action: Detect English language text using language detection
tasks.contents: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
edit target content: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)

tasks.description: Convert each identified English phrase to Camel Case.
tasks.action: Apply Camel Case conversion (e.g., 'hello world' becomes 'HelloWorld')
tasks.contents: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
edit target content: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
content after edit: The COM error -2147221008 indicates that CoInitialize has not been called.  This usually means the COM library hasn't been properly initialized before attempting to use COM objects.  Ensure that CoInitialize or CoInitializeEx is called before any other COM operations.

tasks.action: Check for accuracy and consistency of Camel Case application
